mapper.select: select t.IMPORT_ID ImportId,t.TITLE Title,u.TRUENAME CreatorName,CONVERT(varchar,t.CREATE_TIME,120) CreateTime from HR_CHECK t left join T_S_USER u on t.CREATOR=u.USERID where t.TITLE like '%${value}%' and IMPORT_TYPE=1 order by t.IMPORT_ID desc

select d.IMPORT_ID importId, d.PERSON_ID PersonId,e.PERSON_NAME PersonName,e.CARD_ID CardId, e.CMP_NAME CmpName, d.CHECK_DATE CheckDate,d.CHECK_ADR CheckAdress,d.START_TIME StartTime,d.END_TIME EndTime,d.WORK_HOUR WorkHours,d.DEMO from hr_check_day d inner join hr_employee e on e.PERSON_ID=d.PERSON_ID where d.IMPORT_ID=${value}

select d.IMPORT_ID importId, d.PERSON_ID PersonId,e.PERSON_NAME PersonName,e.CARD_ID CardId, e.CMP_NAME CmpName, d.CHECK_DATE CheckDate,d.CHECK_ADR CheckAdress,d.START_TIME StartTime,d.END_TIME EndTime,d.WORK_HOUR WorkHours,d.DEMO from hr_check_day d inner join hr_employee e on e.PERSON_ID=d.PERSON_ID where e.PERSON_NAME like '%${pName}%' and e.CMP_NAME like '%${cmpName}%'

select t.IMPORT_ID ImportId,t.TITLE Title,u.TRUENAME CreatorName,CONVERT(varchar,t.CREATE_TIME,120) CreateTime from HR_CHECK t left join T_S_USER u on t.CREATOR=u.USERID where t.TITLE like '%${value}%' and IMPORT_TYPE=2 order by t.IMPORT_ID desc

with v1 as ( SELECT e.CMP_NAME cmpName,m.CHECK_MONTH Month,sum(m.check_days) checkDays,sum(m.late_days) lateDays,sum(m.lost_days) lostDays from HR_CHECK_MONTH m inner join HR_EMPLOYEE e on e.PERSON_ID=m.PERSON_ID group by e.CMP_NAME,m.CHECK_MONTH ) select * from v1 order by v1.Month desc,v1.cmpName

with v1 as ( SELECT e.CMP_NAME cmpName,m.CHECK_MONTH CheckMonth,e.PERSON_NAME PersonName,e.CARD_ID CardId, m.check_days checkDays,m.late_days lateDays,m.lost_days lostDays from HR_CHECK_MONTH m inner join HR_EMPLOYEE e on e.PERSON_ID=m.PERSON_ID where e.CMP_NAME='${pName}' and m.CHECK_MONTH= '${pDate}' ) select * from v1
